title: Player Rewards
body: I was told by a friend that Meddler there will be rewards given out during the preseason based on how long you have been playing the game. Is there any general idea what they would be for someone who has been playing for 6+ years?

replies.body: that information is wrong  , during the pre-season there will be a BE store where you can buy URF WW for example with 150000 BE  that's something that mostly old players can achieve

Rozzy Gator is actually correct here. There *ARE* special Veteran Rewards coming with the Preseason Update!

Over on our [**Preseason Update FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115012640908-Preseason-Update-FAQ) if you ctrl+F 'veteran's' you'll be brought to this section...

> Are there any other rewards for veterans coming this preseason?
> 
> We're planning to give out exclusive emotes based on how many hours you've put in since the beginning of League. Playing approximately 500 hours gets you the Defender of the League emote, at around 1,500 hours gets you the Champion of the League emote, and 2,500 hours gets you the ultra-rare Conqueror of the League emote. The cutoff for game hours is August 31, 2017.
